description: Noda is a self-reliant boy who executes the strategies formed by the http://anidb.net/ch15364 [SSS] and fights with a halberd. He does not listen to anyone other than http://anidb.net/ch12092 [Yuri], for whom he has adoration, and is antagonistic to almost everyone else. He has a one-sided rivalry with http://anidb.net/ch12094 [Otonashi]. He is a complete idiot whose weakness is education. He is not afraid to harm or kill anyone who gets in http://anidb.net/ch12092 [Yuri]`s way.
name: Noda
